text: 1. Click on the gray rectangle and drag it over the 'A' and 'B'. Do not Drag too fast.
2. When you release the mouse button the border of the rectangle will disappear. It will reappear when you click on the rectangle again.
3. Click 'Reset' to return the rectangle to its initial position.
4. Click the box below 'Show Connection' to draw a 'bridge' between the top and the bottom. The 'bridge' is only one color.
5. Click the box below 'Show Outline' to see the borders of the 'bridge'
